FOUND IN: Storm in a teacup – meaning a small event that has been exaggerated into seeming much more significant.

Auguste (Augustus is often abbreviated as 'Aug', which can be associated with 'rod' or rod-like form in Latin)

Gag order (an injunction against publicizing information which can also stop jokes from being told)
